title: Watch: 13-Year-Old Girl Rocks Tool, Metallica Classics On Drums Like A Champ [News]
text: Zero_Sound 30 · 8 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply She got popular more than year ago. She's in the related videos right next to all of Meytal Cohen and Nea Batera's drum covers. Thanks for just picking it up, UG. Next article will probably be: Metallica releases new album "Hardwired" 2 That Chop Suey cover is near flawless. 0 Tariso 243 · 5 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply what is up with all the haters? she's good. shouldn't we be encouraging young talents? For all you know, she could be a future drum goddess. sad if she reads the hate comments and may lose interest/love in drumming. i have a daughter and i'd be so proud when she grows 13, she has even half the talent that girl has. 0 Tina S is now jealous 0
